value.string:
<tal:block metal:define-macro="global_definition">
 <tal:block
 tal:define="global portal_url python: here.portal_url();
 global object_actions python: None;
 global workflow_actions python: None;
 global jump_actions python: None;
 global view_actions python: None;
 dummy python: request.RESPONSE.setHeader('Content-Type', 'text/html;; charset=utf-8');
 document context/WebSite_getDocumentValue;
 default_doc context/WebSite_getDefaultDocumentValue;
 global is_edit_mode python: not (not(hasattr(context.REQUEST, 'editable_mode')) or not(context.REQUEST['editable_mode']));
 global is_section python: context.getPortalType() == 'Web Section';
 global is_webdoc python: context.getPortalType() == 'Web Page';
 global is_portal_root python: not is_section and not is_webdoc;
 global valid_default_doc python: default_doc != None and default_doc.getPortalType() == 'Web Page';
 ">
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: document is not None">
 <tal:block
 tal:define=" filtered_actions python: document.portal_actions.listFilteredActionsFor(document);
 object_actions filtered_actions/object_action | nothing;
 workflow_actions filtered_actions/workflow | nothing;
 jump_actions filtered_actions/object_jump | nothing;
 view_actions filtered_actions/object_view | nothing;
 global object_actions python: document.WebSite_replaceActionUrl(object_actions);
 global workflow_actions python: document.WebSite_replaceActionUrl(workflow_actions);
 global jump_actions python: document.WebSite_replaceActionUrl(jump_actions);
 global view_actions python: document.WebSite_replaceActionUrl(view_actions);
 "/>
 </tal:block>
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: document is None">
 <tal:block
 tal:define=" filtered_actions python: here.portal_actions.listFilteredActionsFor(here);
 object_actions filtered_actions/object_action | nothing;
 workflow_actions filtered_actions/workflow | nothing;
 jump_actions filtered_actions/object_jump | nothing;
 view_actions filtered_actions/object_view | nothing;
 global object_actions python: here.WebSite_replaceActionUrl(object_actions);
 global workflow_actions python: here.WebSite_replaceActionUrl(workflow_actions);
 global jump_actions python: here.WebSite_replaceActionUrl(jump_actions);
 global view_actions python: here.WebSite_replaceActionUrl(view_actions);
 "/>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
